text: The Workflow Bridge forwarding agent is responsible for sending data to a Workflow Bridge collection agent. This section has the following subsections: Workflow Bridge Batch Forwarding Agent Configuration Workflow Bridge Batch Forwarding Agent Transaction Behavior, Input/Output Data and MIM Workflow Bridge Batch Forwarding Agent Events
title: Workflow Bridge Batch Forwarding Agent - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
